video.title: De que te quiero, te quiero
video.synopsis: It's love at first sight when Natalia and Diego meet at a festival in Veracruz, but an evil twin and a love triangle make their romance a rocky one.

seasons.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero: Season 1

episodes.synopsis: Natalia finds a barely-sober Diego naked, his body painted black, and takes him in and gives him clothes. When they kiss, his brother happens to see.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 1

episodes.synopsis: Posing as his brother, Rodrigo lures Natalia to an isolated spot and tries to rape her. Andres arrives and attacks -- and possibly kills -- Rodrigo.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 2

episodes.synopsis: Carmen decides to sell the restaurant and join her family in Mexico. Learning that Natalia left with Andres after the attack, Diego marries Diana.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 3

episodes.synopsis: A stranger assaults Diego, but Abdul is fingered for the crime and arrested. While at jail, Diego sees Natalia, who runs away from him in fear.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 4

episodes.synopsis: Diego learns that Natalia sought a job at his company and hires her, but Father Juancho shows up soon after and tells Diego to leave her alone.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 5

episodes.synopsis: Alonso tells Diego that Rodrigo may have sparked Natalia's attitude toward him. Meanwhile, Diego's grandfather offers Natalia money to avoid Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 6

episodes.synopsis: Natalia, disgusted by Diego's grandfather's bribe, throws him out of her house. Meanwhile, Diego's friend Alberto sees Diana with a new guy.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 7

episodes.synopsis: Carlos proposes to Carmen, Diana invites Oliverio to dinner, and Natalia visits Irene at her business with a gift.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 8

episodes.synopsis: Irene is arrested after she steals a credit card, and Eleazar busts Carmen for trafficking when he finds drugs in her suitcase.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 9

episodes.synopsis: Carmen tells Eleazar that Carlos was using her as a drug mule, and Diego asks Alberto to take charge of Carmen's defense.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 10

episodes.synopsis: Natalia pleads with Diego to help defend her mother, whom Eleazar says will be sent to prison. She also wants a job at his company.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 11

episodes.synopsis: Abdul and Paolo are arrested while driving the truck Carlos gave them, which was stolen. Meanwhile, Natalia ruins Diana's dress with soup.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 12

episodes.synopsis: Natalia confronts Diego when she finds his wedding picture with Diana. Later, she overhears him confess his love for her to his aunt.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 13

episodes.synopsis: To stay in Diego's good graces, Diana apologizes to Natalia. Meanwhile, Abdul sends Paolo to intercept Eleazar, and Diego asks Diana for a divorce.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 14

episodes.synopsis: Father Juancho assaults Diego when he finds him with Natalia. Later, Diana seeks Natalia's help in saving her marriage to Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 15

episodes.synopsis: Carmen is punished for fighting with a fellow inmate, Natalia sees Diana kiss Oliverio, and Karina tells Diana the truth about Natalia and Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 16

episodes.synopsis: Eleazar and Diego share their love stories with one another, and when Diana learns that Natalia saw her kiss Oliverio, she sets out to destroy her.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 17

episodes.synopsis: Diana overhears Diego declare his love to Natalia, and Mr. Vicente finds the drugs Diana planted in Natalia's desk.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 18

episodes.synopsis: Diego tries to claim the drugs found in Natalia's desk are his when she's arrested for trafficking, and suspects Diana is behind the incident.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 19

episodes.synopsis: Vicente berates Diana for setting up Natalia, Tadeo learns the truth about Natalia's scholarship, and Diego sees video surveillance of Caprico.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 20

episodes.synopsis: Andres tells Natalia and her brothers that he plans to stay in Mexico City, and Tadeo confronts Vicente about the scholarship.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 21

episodes.synopsis: Alberto's legal maneuvering gets Carmen freed on bail, which Diego pays. Meanwhile, Diana fakes a suicide attempt with sleeping pills.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 22

episodes.synopsis: Carmen confronts Diego about his relationship with Natalia, and Irene takes Vicente to task for hiring Tiburcio and his wife.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 23

episodes.synopsis: Camaron shoots Carlos, a drunken Irene tells Alonso that she loves him, and Tiburcio tells Vicente that Irene's daughter is still alive.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 24

episodes.synopsis: Carmen reports seeing Carlos to Eleazar, whom she finds kissing Kimberly, and he sets up a sting. Once in custody, Carlos admits Carmen is innocent.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 25

episodes.synopsis: Diego fears Diana will attempt suicide again if he presses her for a divorce. Meanwhile, Diana discovers she's pregnant by Oliverio.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 26

episodes.synopsis: Alberto installs a security camera in Alonso's office to catch Diana and Oliverio, and Natalia accidentally gives Diego Diana's pregnancy test.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 27

episodes.synopsis: Alonso and Alberto get proof of Diana's infidelity, and Natalia tells Diego that she saw Diana kissing Oliverio, who must be the father of her baby.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 28

episodes.synopsis: Diego confronts Diana over her infidelity and vows to divorce her. Eleazar tells Alonso that he's always had feelings for Carmen.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 29

episodes.synopsis: Diego throws Diana out of his house. Later, he comes to believe that Natalia is seeing Andres, who derides her for dating a married man.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 30

episodes.synopsis: Alberto advises Diego to get a DNA test performed on Diana's baby and to sue for adultery if it's not his. Lupita sees Eleazar kiss Carmen.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 31

episodes.synopsis: Andres brings Lupita's father to visit her, Chato seeks Carmen and Lupita's forgiveness for abandoning them, and Natalia reconciles with Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 32

episodes.synopsis: Carmen plays Chato and Eleazar against one another, and Diego's business trip takes a series of bad turns, landing Natalia in the emergency room.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 33

episodes.synopsis: Lupita confesses to Eleazar that she likes him dating her mother, despite her father's return. Meanwhile, Diego and Natalia are in a car accident.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 34

episodes.synopsis: Natalia confesses her love for Diego to her mother, who isn't pleased that Diego is married -- a fact she learned from Brigitte.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 35

episodes.synopsis: Diana hires a private detective to create false evidence proving Diego is cheating on her, which she can use in the divorce proceedings.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 36

episodes.synopsis: Diana's divorce attorney presents the judge with a picture of Diego and Natalia holding hands as proof of his infidelity.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 37

episodes.synopsis: Lupita tells the newly returned Chato that she prefers Eleazar to him, and Diana hits a bar to celebrate when she learns that her baby is Diego's.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 38

episodes.synopsis: Diana shows up at Natalia's home and declares to Carmen that Natalia destroyed her marriage to Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 39

episodes.synopsis: Diana pulls a gun on Diego when he confronts her for insulting Natalia. Carmen presents Chato with a list of things he must do to prove his love.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 40

episodes.synopsis: Diana emails Natalia, threatening to abort her baby if Natalia doesn't stop seeing Diego. Meanwhile, Vicente fires Irene.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 41

episodes.synopsis: Eleazar tries to find out why Chato has suddenly reappeared, and Natalia pleads with a reluctant Padre Juancho to appeal to Diana's reason.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 42

episodes.synopsis: Diego reveals to Alberto his intent to sue Caprico rather than pay him what he's owed. Meanwhile, Chato gives money to Carmen.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 43

episodes.synopsis: Alina warns Diego not to leave and threatens to take Diana and prevent him from ever seeing his son. Tadeo decides to invest with Diego and Irene.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 44

episodes.synopsis: Diana seeks Brigitte's help in doing away with Natalia, and Rodrigo awakens from his coma thinking that Diego wanted to disconnect his life support.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 45

episodes.synopsis: Irene learns that Tadeo has a brain tumor. Meanwhile, Diana purchases rat poison in her latest attempt at stopping Natalia.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 46

episodes.synopsis: Tiburcio learns that the girl working with Irene is her daughter. Meanwhile, during a visit from Diana, Rodrigo awakens and vows revenge.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 47

episodes.synopsis: Natalia rejects Diego's gift of his mother's ring and breaks up with him. Meanwhile, Alonso tells Diego that Rodrigo may have attacked Natalia.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 48

episodes.synopsis: An ill Diana rushes to the hospital, where she learns that she must have an abortion. Meanwhile, Natalia hopes to reconcile with Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 49

episodes.synopsis: When Chato is arrested for running an illegal taxi operation, it derails his plans to propose to Carmen.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 50

episodes.synopsis: Brigitte bares all for Diego and suggests an affair, then tells Alberto that Diego harassed her. Meanwhile, Irene prepares for the fashion show.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 51

episodes.synopsis: Natalia steps in when Brigitte twists her ankle on the catwalk, Diana is killed as she tries to run over Natalia, and Diego proposes to Natalia.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 52

episodes.synopsis: Alonso finally pieces together the truth about Rodrigo, Andres and the attack on Natalia, but Diego refuses to believe it.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 53

episodes.synopsis: The other women in Chato's life confront Carmen, who finds a clever way to pay Chato back. Rodrigo tries to charm Brigitte, who believes he's Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 54

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo leaves the hospital on his own. When Diego has an accident shortly afterward, Rodrigo sees a chance to take his twin brother's place.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 55

episodes.synopsis: After Natalia flees a romantic evening with Diego, he asks Alonso and Alberto to explain her behavior, then gets into a fight with Eleazar.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 56

episodes.synopsis: Irene and Alonso remain steadfast in their love as they confront Vicente, and something Natalia overhears sparks her to break up with Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 57

episodes.synopsis: Diego apologizes to Carmen for the things he said about Natalia and vows to propose to her, which he later does in front of his staff.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 58

episodes.synopsis: Paolo's friends pressure him to help rob the bowling alley where he works. Later, he overhears Eleazor and Father Juancho tell Natalia that he's gay.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 59

episodes.synopsis: Paolo learns that Mr. Gino is his father, then is arrested for the bowling alley robbery. Meanwhile, Diego wakes up and flees the hospital.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 60

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo takes Diego into his home to care for him. Later, Carmen catches Diego and Natalia in a romantic moment.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 61

episodes.synopsis: Alberto proposes to Brigitte, Irene learns that she can't have any more children, and Rodrigo discovers that Tadeo fathered a baby with Irene.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 62

episodes.synopsis: Tiburcio tells Father Juancho that Natalia is Irene's daughter. Meanwhile, an allergic reaction puts a quick end to Diego's tryst with Natalia.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 63

episodes.synopsis: Tiburcio has a stroke before he can tell Irene the truth about her daughter; Carmen decides to marry Gino, so Eleazar plans to propose to Kimberly.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 64

episodes.synopsis: Tadeo proposes to Irene, who accepts. Rodrigo tracks Irma to the airport, where he threatens her if she doesn't return to work.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 65

episodes.synopsis: Natalia marries Rodrigo, who's posing as Diego. When she asks him to take her to "Rodrigo," it sparks her memory of the events in Tuxpan.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 66

episodes.synopsis: Natalia visits Diego, believing that he's Rodrigo, and he attacks her. Lupita tells Carmen in a letter that she's leaving town for a few days.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 67

episodes.synopsis: After taking Diego out of the Caceres' home, Alonso tells Irene and Natalia the truth about Rodrigo's deception.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 68

episodes.synopsis: At the cabin, Vicente and Alonso discover that Diego has fled. Later, Alonso tells Diego that Rodrigo posed as him and married Natalia.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 69

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo reveals the truth to his grandfather about what happened in Tuxpan. Meanwhile, Brigitte decides to break up with Alberto.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 70

episodes.synopsis: After Natalia tells Diego what Rodrigo did to her in Tuxpan, Diego asks his grandfather to help him exact revenge against his brother.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 71

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo turns himself in to the police and successfully pleads insanity. Later, Natalia is arrested for attempting to murder Rodrigo.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 72

episodes.synopsis: Diego persuades Natalia to accept Vicente's deal. Released from custody, Rodrigo sees Natalia, who once again mistakes him for Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 73

episodes.synopsis: Vowing revenge, Diego hunts for his brother, while Natalia tells him that she wants nothing to do with either of them until she can tell them apart.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 74

episodes.synopsis: Natalia encounters Diego at Alonso's office, but his advances result in a fight. Meanwhile, Eleazar breaks off his engagement to Kimberly.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 75

episodes.synopsis: Cunchetina asks Gino for a divorce. Meanwhile, Rodrigo tells Natalia that he fell in love with her while impersonating his brother.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 76

episodes.synopsis: Diego and Irene decide to split their clothing line from Caprico, Jaiba opens her home to Abdul for workspace, and Natalia runs into Abdul's father.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 77

episodes.synopsis: Natalia realizes that Abdul is her half-brother, and Abdul Abdala is his father. Vicente agrees to let Irene and Diego spin off their clothing line.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 78

episodes.synopsis: Abdala plans to seduce Jaiba to lure her away from Abdul. Natalia, who's running the workshop in Irene's absence, tells Diego she loves Andres.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 79

episodes.synopsis: Natalia's Acapulco fashion photo shoot is a ploy by Diego to win her back. Meanwhile, Abdala demands that Jaiba end her relationship with Abdul.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 80

episodes.synopsis: A detective tells Tadeo that Natalia isn't his daughter, Diego learns of Rodrigo's crooked business dealings, and Paolo sees Brigitte kissing Rodrigo.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 81

episodes.synopsis: Carmen breaks the news that Eleazar and Kimberly are having a child, and Diego seeks a second DNA test on Natalia and Irene.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 82

episodes.synopsis: Secrets are exposed when Irene and Carmen discuss Natalia's birth, lies from the past and the truth about old friends.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 83

episodes.synopsis: Carmen's children throw her a surprise birthday party, and Irene asks Carmen to share in the love she holds for Natalia.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 84

episodes.synopsis: When Diego places the new DNA test on Irene's desk, Rodrigo finds it and takes it to Vicente. Jaiba tells Paolo that she's marrying Abdul.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 85

episodes.synopsis: Brigitte tells Rodrigo that she's pregnant with his child, and he asks her to tell Alonso it's his. Meanwhile, Jaiba breaks up with Abdul.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 86

episodes.synopsis: Karina tells Natalia of Brigitte's pregnancy and that she wants to abort because it's Rodrigo's child. Carmen and Eleazar share a romantic evening.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 87

episodes.synopsis: Natalia angrily accosts Rodrigo for fathering a child with Brigitte. Later, Rodrigo tells Natalia that he wants to commit suicide.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 88

episodes.synopsis: When Carmen reveals to Abdul that Abdala is his father, he says he never wants to see them again. Brigitte helps Rodrigo deceive Diego.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 89

episodes.synopsis: Alberto attacks Rodrigo for sleeping with Brigitte, but Rodrigo gets the advantage and kills him. Natalia learns that Tadeo and Irene are her parents.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 90

episodes.synopsis: Eleazar arrests Rodrigo, the prime suspect in Alberto's death, and Brigitte confesses to Carmen about her affair with Rodrigo.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 91

episodes.synopsis: Eleazar is taken off Rodrigo's murder case, and Natalia learns that Tadeo is a viable bone marrow donor for her transplant.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 92

episodes.synopsis: Natalia donates bone marrow to Tadeo, and Eleazar demands answers when Kimberly and Morales are arrested for making love in the car.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 93

episodes.synopsis: Brigitte sees Paul Champignon on television and asks Carmen if he's her father. Irene learns that Karina is carrying Alonso's child.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 94

episodes.synopsis: Vicente's secretary speaks out against Rodrigo's fraudulent business dealings. Meanwhile, Eleazar declares his love for Carmen.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 95

episodes.synopsis: Brigitte gets a cold reception when she visits Paul Champignon. Meanwhile, Rodrigo tries to kill Vicente, but Natalia arrives in time to get help.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 96

episodes.synopsis: Abdul marries Mali, and Andres proposes to Natalia at the ceremony. Meanwhile, Diego makes an elaborate plan to seek Natalia's forgiveness.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 97

episodes.synopsis: Natalia tells Diego that she's engaged to Andres. Later, when introducing Simona to Natalia and Andres, Diego tells her that Natalia is his cousin.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 98

episodes.synopsis: Vicente convinces Rodrigo that he lost his memory, Eleazar sees Carmen and Paul Champignon getting drunk together, and Tadeo's cancer returns.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 99

episodes.synopsis: Paul Champignon tries to persuade Eleazar to patch things up with Carmen. Meanwhile, Natalia visits Vicente, who apologizes.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 100

episodes.synopsis: Irene confesses to Alonso that she broke up with him because he's sterile, and Brigitte asks Paul Champignon to give her his last name.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 101

episodes.synopsis: Learning that Natalia will be married within the month, Diego goes to see Simona. Meanwhile, Paul Champignon refuses to give Brigitte his last name.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 102

episodes.synopsis: Vicente's memory begins to lapse when he takes the pills Rodrigo gave him, and Natalia confronts Diego when she sees him enter a hotel with Simona.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 103

episodes.synopsis: Tadeo's doctor tells Irene that the leukemia has returned, and Diego suspects Rodrigo of drugging Vicente, who asks Diego for help.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 104

episodes.synopsis: Natalia learns that Brigitte tricked Diego into believing that Natalia cheated on him with Rodrigo. Meanwhile, Diego gets medical help for Vicente.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 105

episodes.synopsis: Natalia and Irene are with Tadeo when he dies. Meanwhile, Rodrigo gets Hilda away from Tiburcio and kills him.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 106

episodes.synopsis: Hilda finds Tiburcio still alive, Natalia and Irene find a letter left for them by Tadeo, and Vicente asks Tiburcio if Rodrigo murdered Alberto.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 107

episodes.synopsis: Vicente asks Eleazar to declare Rodrigo mentally ill, but when the police close in on him, Rodrigo escapes. Meanwhile, Champignon proposes to Carmen.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 108

episodes.synopsis: Carmen visits Eleazar, who asks her to leave and breaks up with her. Meanwhile, Brigitte seeks Natalia's help in returning to Caprico.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 109

episodes.synopsis: Natalia catches Diego kissing Simona when she goes to tell him she's returning to Caprico, and Eleazar sees security footage of Alberto's murder.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 110

episodes.synopsis: Eleazar sees security footage from the day of Alberto's murder. A man abducts Diego, believing him to be Rodrigo, to turn him in to the police.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 111

episodes.synopsis: Diego threatens his abductor's dog in hopes of escaping, Lupita sends pictures of Carmen with Paul to Eleazar, and Rodrigo buys a fake passport.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 112

episodes.synopsis: Diego is taken to the police station, but he's gagged and can't speak to Eleazar. Later, Natalia tells Diego that she loves Andres.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 113

episodes.synopsis: When Rodrigo is recognized while trying to flee the country, Eleazar confronts him at the airport. The two trade gunfire before Rodrigo is arrested.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 114

episodes.synopsis: Natalia uses a puppet show to say she's sorry to Diego, and Rodrigo goes to jail, where Eleazar tells him to drop his pretense of mental illness.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 115

episodes.synopsis: Diego accidentally calls Natalia by Simona's name, Paul gets Brigitte a job, and Eleazar tells Lupita and Luz he plans to move to Merida.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 116

episodes.synopsis: A passing comet gives everyone the camping bug, including Paul, his children and Carmen, Diego and Simona, and Luz and Eleazar.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 117

episodes.synopsis: Diego and Simona's camping trip turns into disastrous, Eleazar and Luz look for the Garcias, and Alonso gives Rodrigo a clean bill of mental health.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 118

episodes.synopsis: Alonso strikes Rodrigo for insulting Alberto, and the camping trip worsens. Diego runs into Natalia and kisses her.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 119

episodes.synopsis: Diego and Simona split after he confesses that he made love with Natalia, but Natalia doesn't want him back. Meanwhile, Rodrigo flees the hospital.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 120

episodes.synopsis: Fugitive Rodrigo calls Brigitte, who turns him in to impress Paul. Meanwhile, Eleazar takes Carmen to a hotel staffed mostly by her ex-lovers.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 121

episodes.synopsis: Diego presents Natalia with divorce papers, who won't sign them because she still loves him. Later, Rodrigo takes Brigitte and Natalia hostage.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 122

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo calls Eleazar to demand a ransom for Brigitte and Natalia. Natalia is able to communicate their location to Diego, who tries to find them.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 123

episodes.synopsis: Rodrigo is killed and Brigitte loses her baby and a leg in a rattlesnake attempt. Meanwhile, Carmen and Eleazar and Natalia and Diego are married.
episodes.title: De Que Te Quiero Te Quiero Capítulo 124
